message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $6,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7,500, but no higher. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
